headline.main: Where Will Hitler Spend the Winter?

lead_paragraph: Wherever Hitler hibernates, it isn't going to be pleasant. He has never felt the icy breath of Russia or the heat of the African desert. He has never known how very mean the temperature of Europe can be when almost the entire population is not only hungry but half-frozen.
abstract: A O McCormick on Brit-U S aid to USSR
